answers.answer: I'm 15 weeks and ready for it to be over. I'm so excited. Ready to hold my baby.
I'm 14 and 1. I'm ready for the vomiting to be done. I can handle the tiredness and back pain but not the vomiting..
You ladies aren't even half way there. Lol
I hear u ladies im just ready lol this pregnancy has been exhausting but excited to see baby :) luck ladies soon we will be there lets think summer lol
Yes I'm 25 weeks and been ready lol
I'm ready! Not that I'm not enjoying my pregnancy or anything, because really it has been that bad at all for me. I'm soooooooo excited to meet my baby though!

Yes, I know the feeling. I am in my 11th week but I've been practically bedridden with severe naseau for 5 weeks!! It seems like it's been an eternity. I freak out if I think of how much longer I have to go. I can't imagine 1 more week of being this miserable! You just have to take 1 day at a time. Baby will be worth it in the end. Its just hard getting there.
In the second trimester it would get a llot better dont worry:)

Omg I'm 34 weeks and completely miserable now compared to 11 weeks is nothing and I've had a very easy pregnancy no morning sickness at all and now I have gestational diabetes go to the dr every 3 days and he is sitting on my sciatic nerve so I can barely walk! Not to scare y'all or nothing but really it's barely just begun hang tough!
Im ready!!!! At 28 wks put enjoy every second of it.. last pregnancy: ) good luck Ladies.
Im 2 days over due talk about ready. Im so tiered already pregnancy was a great journey but im so ready to have my baby

question: Im so ready to finish pregnancy does anyone feel this way?
title: 16weeks prego
